songs.title: This Love (Cut Copy Galactic Beach House Mix)
songs.album: Call and Response: The Remix Album
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
This, this...
She said goodbye
This, this...

[Chorus]
This love
This love has taken its toll
This love
This love has taken its toll
This love
This love has taken its toll
This love
She said goodbye too many times before

[Bridge]
I'll fix these broken things
Repair your broken wings
I'll fix these broken things
Repair your broken wings
I'll fix these broken things (Taken its toll)
Repair your broken wings
I'll fix these broken things (Taken its toll)
Repair your broken wings
Taken its toll...

[Chorus]
This love
This love has taken its toll
This love
This love has taken its toll
Taken its toll...
